Pre post test measure do low limb power , flexibility agility . Distance cover , pace , heart rate exertion match also assess .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Land Based Water Based Plyometric Training Effects Physical Fitness Field Hockey Players Jamaica
DOC.detailed_description: Plyometric training use variety sport improve power . There minimal research however regard use among hockey player even less research explore water base training . International field hockey competition play wet turf felt water training may beneficial player . The study explore whether water base plyometrics prove additional benefit compare land base plyometrics Jamaican hockey athlete . The member Jamaica hockey club recruit participate study . Recruitment do principal investigator Dr. Roopchand-Martin . A total 34 person recruit randomly allocate aquatic land base training . All training programme conduct section physical therapy train do two time per week 6 week . Baseline assessments do independent evaluator low limb power use Standing Broad Jump Vertical Jump Test , anaerobic power use Running Anaerobic Sprint test , agility use Illinois agility T test , flexibility use Sit Reach Test performance game play wet artificial turf relation time-motion analysis total distance cover , total time , average maximum pace , average maximum heart rate , time heart zone 1-5 , change rate perceive exertion .
DOC.criteria: All club hockey player age 16 Kingston St. Andrew , Jamaica Persons musculoskeletal injury hip knee , undergone surgery injection past 3 month , rehabilitation phase undergo high intensity training exclude . Persons skin disease , open wound selfreported aqua phobia also exclude .
